thread.title: Hollyoaks at 20: the famous faces

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Hollyoaks at 20: the famous faces
text:
MORE... 
Played: James ‘Jambo’ Bolton, from 1995-98 
Jolly Jambo was one of the original Hollyoaks cast members, and his daft antics won him a place in the nation’s hearts (well, some of them anyway). Actor Will Mellor has arguably been one of the most successful of the Chester alumni, having gone on to star in sitcom Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps, Casualty, Waterloo Road and Broadchurch. His brief pop career peaked when his cover of Leo Sayer’s ‘When I Need You’ hurtled to No.5 in 1998. Picture: Phil Fisk/Channel 4
